description: Apartment block hit. Crater is very large, possibly cruise or ballistic missile as part of attack on nearby airport. Appear to have been multiple civilian casualties, AA Agency reporting 1 x fatality 12 x wounded.
Civilians hit by what appears to have been artillery, possibly a rocket. Appears to have been at least one fatality, possibly a child.
Explosion in central Kyiv, nothing further yet.
Explosion in central Kyiv, nothing further yet.
[Graphic: Image shows a dead child wrapped in a blanket] Child killed by explosion.
civilian homes hit by artillery.
A civilian casualty from an explosion.
Artillery fire on what appears to be an urban area.
Civilian buildings damaged and destroyed by shelling.
Apparent strike on hospital in separatist held area.
Apartment building on fire; three people reported injured
Military vehicle runs over a civilian vehicle; at least one civilian inside appears to have survived. Unclear which country the military vehicle belongs to.
Rocket motor lodged in a street at zebra crossing.
Another weapon remnant (also possibly from a BM-30 rocket) in another area of Kharkiv
Rocket motor embedded in pavement in residential area.
Smoke rising from a residential building on Victory Avenue; accompanying text suggests smoke is the result of firefight in the area.
Russian or Ukrainian speaking men in a vehicle come under fire as they approach a roadblock.
[Graphic: Image shows at least one dead person lying by a pool of blood] Kindergarten hit by cluster munition.

[Graphic: Video shows three dead, bloodied people laying on the street] At least three civilians killed while driving in a vehicle on Krillovskaya Street, Kyiv. Civilians were allegedly mistaken for Russian infiltrators.
Residential building showing signs of explosive damage.
Video of burned-out building. Accompanying text indicates it was the central market.
Civilian vehicle comes under fire while driving down a highway.
Hospital and adjacent building come under small arms fire.
[Graphic: Video shows bloodied man receiving medical care] At least one civilian injured as vehicles come under small arms fire.
Residential building and civilian vehicles damaged by missile/artillery strike.
Residential building damaged by rocket motor.
Multiple Launch Rocket System barrage in the middle of an intersection in a residential/business area.
[Graphic: Video shows charred human remains] At least one person killed by explosion, allegedly from artillery strike.
Zoo damaged by explosions.
Residential building hit by missile.
Apartment building on fire; three people reported injured.
[Graphic: Video shows a dead body lying on the road] Explosions damage residential neighbourhood and kill at least one person.
Attack on marked civilian ambulance, claimed 2 civilian fatalities and one civilian injury.
Ukrainian State Emergency Service reports that a shell impacted the village of Borodyanka near Kyiv, killing at least three people.
Children's hospital hit by artillery.
Residential building damaged by explosion.
Bus came under fire, multiple civilian fatalities.
Artillery firing from residential area.
Soldiers wearing red bands on arms looting a supermarket.
Soldiers wearing Russian camouflage, with a white recognition band stealing a safe from a bank.
School on fire, unknown if any casualties.
Shchorsa Cinema in urban area completely destroyed.
Residential area damaged by what may be ballistic missile. Large crater.
Damage to residential buildings after shelling.
Residential building damaged by explosion. Large crater.
Damage to residential building.
Cluster munition remnant embedded on residential street.
Multiple Launch Rocket System barrage on commercial area.
ENT department of hospital hit by what appears to have been artillery.
Widespread damage in what appears to be civilian area.
[Graphic: Video shows a conscious woman whose leg has been amputated by a falling missile remnant] Civilian suffers fatal injury as the result of a falling munition remnant.
[Graphic: Video shows at least two dead, bloodied bodies lying on the street] Explosions kill at least two people and damage civilian infrastructure.
Residential apartment buildings and civilian vehicles damaged by explosions.
Cluster munition strike on residential area in Kharkiv.
Smoke from Multiple Launch Rocket System strike, likely north side of Kharkiv.
Rocket motor impacted inside civilian apartment.

[Graphic: Images and videos show dead bodies and dead dogs. The second source is extremely graphic, as it captured the moment of the shooting that resulted in the fatalities] Several people and their dogs killed by small arms fire.
Munition remnant embedded in pavement.
Civilian areas shelled, many residential buildings destroyed.
Damage to (allegedly) "School No. 42".
Cluster munitions detonate in a residential parking lot and adjacent areas.
Individual injured by shelling, ambulance responds.
Residential buildings destroyed by shelling.
Residential buildings destroyed by shelling.
Maternity clinic damaged by explosions.
Missile strike hits city administration, theater buildings.
Civilian vehicles, residential building damaged in shelling.
Strike on a residential building, four people reported injured.
Elderly civilian man and woman killed in vehicle by what appears to be a BMP variant.
Missile exploded on the sidewalk. Reportedly one pedestrian died.
Residential building hit by strike.
Vasylkiv technical college heavily damaged by a rocket strike.
Vasylkiv Professional College of the National Aviation University (civil aviation) was heavily damaged, reportedly by a rocket strike.
Private house and outbuildings damaged by a reconnaissance drone that was shot down.
[Graphic: Video shows charred human remains inside a vehicle] At least one person killed in a vehicle fire, allegedly caused by an explosion.
Local History Museum in the village Ivankov being burned out.
Partially collapsed block of flats in Kharkiv, Saltovka district. At least one individual was reported to be killed.
Civilian houses shelled.
School No. 24 shelled in Kherson.
Soldiers in Russian uniform appear to shoot at person filming them.
Widespread and significant damage to residential area.
[Graphic: Three images show a bloodied child receiving first aid. One image shows the corpse of the child] Child killed.
[Graphic: Videos and pictures show multiple dead and dismembered bodies lying on the street] Widespread destruction and at least one fatality in an alleged airstrike on a residential area.
Building located in the Kharkiv State Aircraft Manufacturing Company complex. Most likely not a hospital. Entrance to nearby underground entrance also damaged.
[Graphic: Images show three charred bodies] Three civilians killed in strike near Kyiv TV Tower.
Tank opens fire on residential building.
Tochka ballistic missile strike with 9N24 submunitions on residential area near playground and school.

Headquarters of the National Police and Security Service of Ukraine, and the building of the Faculty of Economics of Kharkiv National University, suffered significant damage and was set on fire after strike.
Strike damage to residential area.
[graphic: badly wounded bodies] Dead civilians in a forest; allegedly shot by Russian soldiers while making Molotov cocktails.
Primary school #75 in Kharkiv shelled.
Primary school #118 in Kharkiv suffered damage from a strike.
Strike on large store.
Strike on brewery. Likely a ballistic missile.
Strike on what appears to be a residential area.
Strike in what appears to be civilian area, possibly near city council.
Apparent impact at Kharkiv School 17
Damage to a kindergarten building
Reportedly, one civilian was killed and 6 injured in an artillery strike in Gorlovka, DPR
Assault on an individual in civilian clothing by armed men on Mykilska Slobidka in Kyiv
Residential area damaged by shelling
Widespread damage to civilian buildings and streets in bombing/shelling
Abandoned armoured vehicles and a person's body
Reported school for blind children shelled in Kharkiv
Shopping center and warehouse burning
Damage to residential buildings in 1st Mikrorayon
Homes damaged by bombing/shelling
Two schools and residential buildings struck, Governor Chaus reported nine deaths

Residential building destroyed in airstrike, voice notes that a pharmacy has also been hit. Multiple munitions observed in the air in dashcam source; civilian casualties visible at the end of the video. Reports of 30 fatalities.
Multiple Launch Rocket System on what appears to be a residential area. Area of impact close to airport.
Catastrophic damage to what appears to be a residential building.
Remnants of a missile at an oil depot
Cluster munition attack in residential area of Kharkiv near to the airport
Aftermath of an attack on a car park in a residential area
Buildings destroyed in shelling, including heavy damage to a school.
Heavy damage, likely from artillery, to administrative area.
Heavy damage to local tourism centre (which holds events for children) and surrounding civilian buildings
Damage to residential & commercial areas
Report of shelling of residential area.
Residential block repeatedly struck by what appears to be a direct-fire weapon.
20 houses reported to have been damaged by a strike, as well as further casualties.
Civilian shot in leg at reported protest
Damage to central city library
Novosaltovsky market in Kharkiv destroyed
Widespread damage to residential buildings in village. Allegedly 1 person killed. Very large crater.
[Graphic: blood and bodies] Strike on a line of civilians queueing outside a supermarket. Multiple small impacts indicate cluster munitions.
Strike on Vinnytsia Havryshivka International Airport
[Graphic: bodies] Three members of a family of four reportedly killed by strike in corridor being used by civilians. Crater visible in some videos.
A reported kindergarten and playground damaged in bombing/shelling
Residential buildings on fire due to bombing/shelling
Extensive damage to homes from a strike. CCTV indicates event happened at 02:25 AM on the 6th. Significant crater. Ukrainian military base approx 200m away at 51.328175, 28.800817.
Catastrophic damage to residential building, reportedly after strikes.
"Voznesensʹka Tserkva" church damaged by strike
Residential building hit by explosion
Residential building, cars damaged by explosion
Residential, commercial buildings damaged/destroyed by explosion
Residential buildings damaged by explosion. Large explosion crater in playground.
Residential buildings, vehicles destroyed by explosion
Shopping centre destroyed by explosion
A church on fire after reportedly being struck by artillery.
Rocket motor for Multiple Launch Rocket System launched cluster munitions on the street in Kharkiv
Rocket motor for cluster munitions in park path in Kharkiv
Victim operated device on street in Kherson
Civilian casualties after shelling in Kharkiv
Primary school #96 in Velyka Danylivka was damaged by shelling.
Block of flats on Metrobudivnykiv St. in Kharkiv damaged after shelling.
Block of flats is on fire due to explosion.
Administrative/commercial building damaged in explosion.
Damage, reportedly from artillery and fire at the University of the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine.
What appears to be an attack by an armoured column on Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Station.
Civilian killed in vehicle.
School damaged in explosion.
Correctional facility and adjacent buildings damaged in explosion.
Shops and residences damaged in Kharkiv.
Kindergarten, residential buildings damaged in explosion.
The historical building on fire in Kharkiv (at night)
Kindergarten and nearby apartments damaged by explosion.
Destruction of local Orthodox Church, allegedly by artillery
Rocket motors embedded in various locations.
Residential area destroyed
Hospital destroyed by explosion
Widespread destruction of commercial and residential buildings in the centre of the city
Oil refinery damaged by strike, reportedly by Tochka ballistic missile.
Residential area with damage from likely artillery strike.
Multiple Launch Rocket System strike on residential area.
Fire in residential tower block.
Heavy damage to residential/commercial area
Akhtyrka City Council destroyed.
Multiple Launch Rocket System launching from civilian area towards South West.
Kharkiv tram depot struck.
Images and videos reportedly showing the removal of munitions. Images include rocket motors and at least two 9n235 submunitions.
Several buildings damaged in explosions.
Residential towerblock on fire.
Large crater visible in residential area
Maternity hospital in Mariupol heavily damaged by strike. Multiple injuries and fatalities reported. At least one large crater visible.
[graphic: bodies under cover] Military ambulance marked with red cross attacked.
Crater in road in front of hospital and children's hospital.
Widespread damage caused by strike.
Damage caused by strike. Large crater visible.
Fish processing factory destroyed by missile
Civilians flee into damaged metro station as explosions can be seen in distance
Several buildings damaged in explosions. One civilian casualty lying dead on the street.
Heavy damage to residential area, large crater visible.
Large crater in residential area.
What appears to be an artillery barrage impacting a residential area.
Heavy damage to a building associated with the SESU, Ukrainian civil defence.
Damage to city council building.
Large shopping center destroyed.
Multiple Launch Rocket System launch from residential area, firing to south-east
Cluster munition strike in residential area.
Child hugging cargo warhead for cluster munition.
Food warehouse struck.
Fire in what appears to be an industrial area after a reported Multiple Launch Rocket System strike.
Large crater in what appears to be residential area.
Explosion damage to commercial and residential buildings.
Explosion damage to dormitories and church building at Svyatohirsk Lavra Monastery where refugees were sleeping. Reports of several wounded.
US journalist Brent Renaud killed by small arms fire in Irpin.
Widespread damage caused to village. Unclear if a result of fighting.
Multiple Launch Rocket System barrage onto northern Kharkiv, video shows both the launch and impact.
Report of at least one killed in strike on residential apartment block in Kyiv. Significant damage.
Large crater and damage in what appears to be a residential area.
Heavy damage to pink apartment block, reportedly on Freedom St.
Strike on TV mast and station, reports of 20 fatalities.
What appears to have been a strike using a cluster variant of a Tochka ballistic missile. Reports of tens of casualties.
Explosion on street in daylight.
What appears to be a body in a residential area. No information about how they died.
2 x cargo warheads impacted in Mykolaiv zoo. Direction of origin appears to be to the East.
1 x rocket motor impacted Mykolaiv zoo.
Mykolaiv Oncology Hospital struck by what appears to be cluster munitions.
Tarnovsky House, historic building used as youth library, damaged
Damage to front of local historic church, windows shattered
Inside view of school classrooms damaged by attack
New Life evangelical prayer hall damaged by attack

Drone footage of an individual with their hands up dressed in civilian clothes appearing to be shot by people with white bands around their limbs, from a position where there is a tank with a white "V" marked on it.

BBC report indicates others were killed in this area and identifies the two killed in this incident as Maksim and Ksjena Iowenko,
Munition remnants embedded in pavement
Three people caught in explosions, reportedly by a bus stop.
What appears to be CCTV depicting Multiple Launch Rocket System impacting in central Kharkiv at night.
Fire in what appears to be residential buildings.
Residential building suffered damage. Crater visible, diameter approx 5m.
[very graphic: badly wounded bodies] Two people killed in strike on school.
Tochka missile rocket motor landed immediately next to oil depot.
Bus depot damaged, reportedly by artillery. Impact crater visible.
[graphic: body parts] Reports that one person was killed and two wounded in artillery strike.
Destruction caused to residential buildings.
Three reported wounded after an artillery strike.
Three wounded after a strike reportedly hit a kindergarten.
Three reported injured after a strike immediately next to a hospital.
Three reported injured after a strike impacted a residential area.
Damage to various buildings after reported artillery strike.
Damage to residential area, including an old person's home, after artillery strike.
Heavy damage to residential building. Large crater visible.
Two cargo warheads for rocket-launched cluster munition impacted in paved road next to the central market.
[graphic: body] Explosion in vicinity of person filming from car, next to ice hockey rink. Burning vehicle further to north appears to have a single fatality lying next to it.
Mariupol Drama Theater destroyed in strike. Reports that the theater was being used as a shelter by a large number of civilians.
Mariupol City Palace of Culture destroyed.
10 people reportedly killed while waiting for food. Source 1 is blurred.
Local market on fire after strike. Report of at least one fatality.
Strike in residential area. Crater approx 3m in diameter. Claim states that a Tochka was used.
TV tower reportedly hit by strike.
What appear to be fragments of a cruise missile, reportedly after a strike which impacted a school.
Report of the opening of an investigation into a market struck on the 17th March. May be incident CIV0405.
Cargo warhead clearly visible at 00:28.
Rocket motor impacted next to tram stop.
Heavy damage in what appears to be a residential area. Large crater. Reports of multiple injuries and one fatality.
Damage to kindergarten from strike.
Damage to a school.
Damage to a residential building. A "higher educational institution" was also reported to be damaged. The National Academy of the National Guard is immediately to the east of this location.
Craters indicating strikes on heavy industrial facilities. Craters visible.
Strikes on industrial area.
What appear to be civilian vehicles hit by machine-gun fire, reportedly from a vehicle.
[extremely graphic: bodies with very traumatic injuries] at least five people killed in what is reported to have been an artillery strike.
Reports of deaths and injuries caused by a strike on a residential and administrative area.
Large fire in Chernihiv industrial district reportedly after shelling.
School No. 36 heavily damaged.
School no. 66 heavily damaged.
Widespread destruction in residential area.

Very large detonation in Kyiv, appearing to hit the Retroville shopping mall. CCTV videos show small flash before larger detonation. Source 19 shows what appear to be green-painted trucks under this building. Other open sources indicate there was military activity in this area.
Individuals shot and injured in Kherson, reportedly at a peaceful protest.
Ammonia industrial facility damaged by strike.
Mental Health Center reportedly hit in a strike. Large crater, approx 5m diameter, visible.
Crater in the ground in Mariupol
Rocket motor impacted in dirt path.
Rocket motor impacted grove of trees next to children's playground.
Cargo warhead impacted into road outside what may be a healthcare facility.
Rocket motor impacted into earth.
Multiple residential blocks on fire, reportedly after strikes.
Stock footage of widespread damage to residential and commercial buildings in different parts of the city.
News footage of widespread damage to residential buildings. One building with very significant damage.
Residential building on fire; others damaged in explosions.
Residential building showing signs of fire.
Video compilation showing residential unit with small arms damage, residential buildings in the distance on fire.
School destroyed by explosion and fire.
Widespread damage in residential area.
Residential building shot at with small arms.
Mariupol airport damaged by explosions.
Damage and burn marks to residential buildings.
Widespread destruction to residential area. Large crater.
Rocket motor embedded in llama enclosure, reportedly Kharkiv zoo.
Reports of 15 residences destroyed in a strike. Nosecone of a 9M544/9M549 guided cargo missile included in imagery.
Drone footage of what appears to be a residential area. Several buildings smoke coming from them visible.
Damaged building near train station.
The bridge over Desna river was reportedly destroyed.
Kindergarten #109 in Kyiv District, Kharkiv damaged.
Soldiers reportedly looting from residential areas.
Drone footage of building with explosion, reportedly at the department of mechanization.
Shelling of a residential area in the village of Peredelskoye near Schastya.
Damage to a power plant in Donbas.
Damage to a residential building in the Shevchenkivskyi district.
Guided 9M544/9M549 landed near residential areas.
Possible use of incendiaries on the outskirts of Kyiv.
Residential house destroyed in Chernihiv.
Aftermath of shelling in Mariupol. Second video, presence of graves.
Rocket motor impacted in patio next to garden fence.
Kindergarten and residential buildings destroyed by strike. Small craters evidence in pavement.
[graphic: blurred bodies]. What appear to be multiple bodies and damage to an area, reportedly after a strike.
Drone footage of widespread destruction to a residential area.
Central House of Culture of Irpen reportedly destroyed by shelling.

A queue of people, reportedly waiting for humanitarian aid, hit by what appears to have been a rocket motor. Fragments of a rocket are visible in source 2. Small crater visible. Cargo warhead and another rocket motor recovered from nearby.
9N210 or 9N235 submunition recovered from railway line. Other images already logged.
Kharkiv National University of Civil Engineering and Architecture damaged by strike.
The church of the blessed matron of Moscow reportedly damaged by shelling.
A mental health facility was allegedly struck by artillery.
Use of Incendiaries, possibly thermite.
Cargo warhead and one person lying on the ground. Strike appears to be immediately next to Hospital No. 1. There were reported to have been 4 fatalities and several wounded.
What appears to have been a incendiary weapon strike on the Donetsk Water Filtration plant.
Drone footage of what is reported to be a TOS-1A thermobaric Multiple Launch Rocket System impacting in a residential area.
Building of the Mykolaiv regional administration destroyed in strike. 12 people reported to have been killed.
Strike on oil depot.
Unexploded 9N210 or 9N235 submunition and cargo warhead recovered.
Graphic video of two bodies with bicycles next to them on a road
Destruction of the town of Trostyanets
Destruction to buildings in a civilian area
ICRC with Red Cross painted on roof was attacked. ICRC stated that no ICRC staff had been present since 15th March.
Destruction to residential buildings
Destruction of what appear to be residential buildings.
Residential building heavily damaged.
Destruction to what was reportedly an "architectural monument" and the Zalopanskaya fire department.
Apartment block on fire, reportedly the aftermath of shelling.
Burnt apartment block, reportedly the aftermath of a shelling.
Damage to a residential area, near a school
Vifania church destroyed
Report that a food warehouse has been destroyed.
Damage to residential buildings.
Damage to what appears to be a hospital.
What appear to be artillery impact craters
Strikes on residential areas.
School no. 30 hit by strike.
TOS-1A thermobaric launch.
Destroyed shops and what may be a ruptured gas pipeline.
Large number of cows killed at Agromol dairy farm.
Oil depot in Belgorod attacked by helicopters.
Strike on residential area.
[graphic: bodies] seven bodies in civilian clothes killed, at least two with hands tied behind their backs. Russian army ration packs & ammunitions container present at the site.
At least 20 bodies lying along a residential street, at least one with hands tied behind their back. The Mayor [source 4] claimed they had been shot in the back of the head.
Reportedly a missile impacting inside Russia from an easterly direction.
Demonstration against occupation violently dispersed.
Rocket motors and cluster munitions impacted in town.
Multiple bodies in civilian clothing along highway.
[Graphic: bodies] Five bodies with hands tied behind their backs in a dark room, likely a cellar.
[Graphic: grave] Mass grave of both civilians and reported troops. Grave has been in use since early March.
Troops dispersing protesters with tear gas and shots.
TOS-1A thermobaric launch.
Men, one with with white recognition band tied around arm and leg, smash window to gain entrance to gas station.
Many destroyed vehicles on Bucha, Vorzel, Nemishajeve, Borodyanka section of highway.
Cluster munition strike which killed and wounded multiple people. Vice documentary.
Unexploded 9N210 or 9N235 submunition.
122mm HE rocket barrage struck Gorky Park.
[graphic: blood] Shopping area hit by cluster munition strike. Multiple casualties evident in imagery. Reports that 9 were killed, 20 wounded. Impact marks consistent with submunition.
Hospital hit by strike
[graphic: bodies] strike on a bus stop.
children's' hospital hit by strike
IED in stairway of residential building

Area around an oncology hospital was attacked while MSF staff were visiting at approx 15.30. They reported seeing one dead body and several others injured while leaving. They also reported that a pediatric hospital, 300 meters away was hit
Shopping center hit by strike.
Damage to residential buildings
Damage to buildings in Mariupol
Damage to residential buildings in Mariupol
Damage to residential buildings in Mariupol
Damage to buildings in Mariupol, one reportedly a school
Buildings destroyed in Kyiv
Woman detailing her husband's murder, with what is reportedly his body in the background
Destruction to residential buildings
Drone footage showing massive amounts of damage to residential area
Destruction to residential buildings
Damage to commercial areas
[graphic: bodies] Attack on what was reportedly a humanitarian aid distribution center, appears to be a school.

[extremely graphic: burnt bodies] 5 partially burned bodies next to trash pile. Burning appears to have been localised to the bodies. The New Yorker reports that locals claimed they were carried there by a Russian tank.
Chemical facility struck, reportedly releasing large cloud of nitric acid.
Oil depot destroyed in strike
CCTV of strike in a residential area.
CCTV of children's hospital being struck.
Rocket motor impacted into parked car.
[graphic: bodies and injured people] Tochka strike on railway station, which was reportedly full of people.
[graphic: bodies, head] Several dead bodies, including one that has been decapitated.
Tank of nitric acid reportedly destroyed in explosion.
Church damaged in attack - associated image shows what appears to be an ODAB 500 air-dropped bomb.
CCTV of 9N210 or 9N235 submunitions impacting onto road
Chernihiv water treatment plant suffered damage after shelling.
MLRS strike on residential area
Children's hospital in Kharkiv damaged after shelling
CCTV of artillery attack on Kharkiv.
Cargo warhead impacted in children's playground. Report notes 20 people wounded and one killed.
[Graphic: obscured body] At least one body, possibly more, recovered from a manhole.
[Graphic: bodies inc. children] Bodies of what appears to have been a four people, including a young child, recovered from grave near destroyed car.
Seven people reported wounded after strike hit residential area. Large crater.
[Graphic: multiple bodies] Seven people reported to be killed, and 34 wounded in Kharkiv.
Residential building heavily damaged.
A reported educational facility was destroyed.
Explosion in the yard of a church. Crater present.
Drone footage showing damage to residential area in Markiv.
Damage to a university in Irpin.
Damage to residential area in Luhansk.
Damage to residential area in Borodyanka.
Tank fires at residential building complex
Fire department destroyed
Strikes on what appears to be a residential area. S-13 rocket motor visible in one video.
Cargo warhead and rocket motor remnant in a zoo.
Widespread destruction of civilian buildings.
Large impact crater on a residential street.
Drone footage of extensive damage to the Azovstal Iron Works
Destroyed homes.
Post Office logistics terminal hit by strike. Remnants of what appears to be a cruise missile recovered from scene.
Tram and tram stop damaged by strike.
Cargo warhead, fragments and unexploded 9N210/9N235 submunition
Several people who appear to be civilians wounded by strikes - secondary strikes as they are being treated.
Reports of 10 fatalities and 35 wounded from a strike in the Industrial District. Cargo warheads and submunitions craters evident.
Residential area damaged by explosions.
Heavy damage to stores in Kharkiv.
What appears to be a residential building damaged and on fire after a reported shelling.
Multiple cruise missile strikes in Lviv. Regional governor said four strikes hit military targets, one hit a tyre repair shop. Seven people reported killed.
Video showing multiple explosions in a reported residential area.
Damage to what was reportedly a hospital.
2 missiles landing and explosions in what appears to be an industrial area, but could also be a residential area behind it
Damage to what appears to be a residential area.
Damage to what appears to be a residential building after a strike. By one report, at least 6 people were died, including one 3 month old child, with 18 wounded as the result of a strike.
Damage to what was reportedly the railway hospital.
Images of the destruction at the Mariupol seaport after it's liberation a few days ago
An explosion at the Ministry for State security. In the videos and images, there is evidence of a rocket-propelled grenade attack.
Visible damage to a school building, "School 33", in Mariupol.
Man films himself after strike stating "I'm liberated. Fucking liberated"
Heavy destruction to Hotel Ingul.
19th century library suffered heavy damage with large crater after strike.
CCTV of explosion at warehouse with trucks. Truck appears to be on fire and smoking before detonation.
Damage reported over a wide area, reportedly due to an intercepted Tochka strike.
Fire at the Azovstal facility.
Damage to schools and other buildings.
Multiple homes damaged or destroyed by explosions.
Aluminium factory targeted in air strike
[Graphic: body covered with blanket] Aftermath of a reported shelling in Kharkiv
Bridge destroyed near Odessa
Small explosion noises and smoke visible during a reported dispersal of a protest in Kherson
Damage to what was reportedly a medical clinic and residential building
Damage to what was reportedly a school
Shelling of what appears to be a residential area
Reportedly an explosion of an ammo depot, close to a residential area
Area around the railway station in Lviv smoking after an attack.
Explosion in vicinity of Heroiv Pratsi metro station
Explosion struck a Sanatorium. Possibly a precision guided munition.
Rocket motor impacted into garden area of hospital.
Strike on industrial area.
Cruise missiles strikes on Kyiv.
Oil depot destroyed in strike
Tank firing into residential building.
Cargo warhead and damage consistent with submunition impacts.
9M525 with the yellow nose, cargo warhead and unexploded 9N210 or 9N235 submunitions recovered.
Missile strikes farm.
A "mined scooter" exploded in a residential neighbourhood.
Aftermath of rocket strike on a residential building
School destroyed.
Church damaged by explosion.
Bridge with civilian vehicles targeted in shelling
Damage to what appears to be commercial infrastructure and residential buildings, reportedly to the Riviera shopping mall.
Damage to what appears to be a commercial building.
School destroyed by explosion.
School damaged by explosion.
School and community centre destroyed by explosion.
Wine store damaged in explosion.
Homes destroyed by explosion.
Residential buildings damaged by explosion.
Missile or artillery strike on a residential area captured on dashcam footage.
Rocket cargo section embedded in pavement near residential area.
What look like commercial buildings damaged by explosion.
Munition remnant embedded in pavement of parking lot.
Menorah statue damaged, allegedly by artillery.
School damaged by explosion.
Barabashova Market destroyed by explosions.
No. 167 school destroyed by explosions.
City council building destroyed by explosion.
Destruction of a reported school in Luhansk.
Destruction of a church.
Damage to church in Donetsk.
Bombing of Azovstal steel company in Mariupol with allegedly phosphorus bombs
Residential buildings destroyed by explosions.
Damaged bridge
Destruction to commercial and residential buildings
Supermarket on fire following shelling
Damage to commercial and residential buildings
Cluster munition strike kills one civilian, injures others.
Residential buildings damaged and destroyed by explosions.
Heavy damage to a large building on the coast in Odessa's Kyiv region.
Reports of casualties after a strike on what appears to be a market area.
Damage to a reported primary school and residential area.
Large crater visible next to damaged supermarket.
Large crater immediately next to religious site which has sustained some damage.
Damage to residential buildings.
Damage to residential and commercial buildings.
Video showing a cultural center hit by missile, extensive damage. According to reports, at least 7 people were injured, including a child.
Derhachi house of culture destroyed by strike.
Severodonetsk Multidisciplinary Hospital suffered damage due to strike.
Damage to the football stadium where the Ukrainian national team reportedly trained.
Bridge between Severodonetsk and Lisichansk destroyed
Pension Fund destroyed by strike.
Heavy damage to residential area.
Extremely clear use of incendiary munition use against Ukrainian positions in Avozstal Plant.
Several buildings destroyed by explosions.
Shopping center damaged.
Heavy damage to residential buildings.
Video showing destroyed buildings in Dolyna, near the front lines in Donetsk oblast.
Widespread damage, including small craters consistent with cluster submunitions.
Widespread damage, including submunition craters and embedded cargo warhead in residential area.
Kindergarten heavily damaged by strike.
Damage to shops and residential buildings
Damages on the Intersport and Epicenter in Kharkiv.
Solyana Symfoniya Sanitorium destroyed by strike.
Two monastery buildings were damaged during shelling, reportedly killing three people.
Damage to school in Saltivka, Kharkiv.
Damage to a commercial mall in Severodonetsk
SES fire station hit in Sviatohirsk
Shelling in Mykolaiv that resulted in at least one civilian fatality

Residential buildings damaged by fire and explosions.
School destroyed by fire.
Missiles hitting the Darnytsia Car Repair Plant.
Burned cars in the aftermath of a shelling, reportedly killing one person.
Military facility and 4 houses were reportedly hit in Chortkiv.
The humanitarian facility in Lisichansk was struck, reportedly with 40 people sheltering inside.

School No. 6 destroyed in Avdiivka, according to reports, it had been used as a "humanitarian center".

Damage as the result of a shelling near a reported gas station.

Large crater visible in front of what appears to be an administrative building.
Long lines of people in civilian clothes, reportedly queuing for food.

Explosions in Kharkiv.

Cruise missile strike impacted residential block and near Kindergarten at 50.464581, 30.484389. Possible target was the HQ of Zavod Artem, an arms manufacturer. At least one child appears to have been injured.
Two missiles hit a shopping mall. At least 18 people were killed, and 57 others were injured.
Explosion in the immediate vicinity of a bridge.
Large crater visible after residential area struck.
A school in Toretsk was destroyed.
A reported medical lab was damaged.
Damage to mosque in Mariupol.
Explosion in a commercial/industrial area. Reportedly, 4 people were killed and 9 wounded in the explosion.
Large crater visible in a stadium.
Secondary school struck and destroyed.
Shelling of what appears to be a residential area, much of the footage is blurred.
Plume of smoke rising from Berdyansk port.
Residential house destroyed by shelling.
Large crater in the parking lot of a school.
Massive damage to what appear to be residential areas across Lysychanksk. Reportedly, at least 8 people died.
Explosive damage to residential and commercial buildings.
Explosion damages woodworking facility.
Buildings destroyed by the side of a road.
Massive damage to several homes, at least two bodies were reportedly pulled from the wreckage.
Small fires visible on the side of the road, possibly phosphorus capsules.

Strike impacted several locations, including a market.
Market destroyed by strike. Reports claim this may have been an ammunition storage location.
Police department and residential buildings destroyed by explosions.

Destroyed residential and commercial buildings, as well as a church.
School destroyed by strike.

Widespread damage to residential and commercial buildings.
Explosive damage to a restaurant.
Residential buildings destroyed by explosion.
[Graphic: Some of the images show mutilated dead bodies, including those of children] Commercial area, including a theater, hit by missiles. Reports of at least one dozen civilians killed.
Business center/hotel shelled in central Mykolaiv. Damage to upper floors.

Parachute-retarded bomb impacted outside Palace of Culture and Technology.
Building in residential area struck. Reportedly 6 fatalities and two wounded.

Shopping mall, hotel and other buildings damaged by explosions.

Sports stadium damaged by explosion.
School destroyed by strike.
